attributes.action: Consult the taxpayers on any plan to introduce any further public funding of political parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current enquiries regarding illegal donations to the Labour party have led to the predictable promise to "clean up" funding of political parties.  I propose that before taxpayers are required to pay any form of political levy, that they have the opportunity to vote on acceptance of such a plan.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
